ch.epfl.alpano.gui

Interface ImagePainter


  • public interface ImagePainter
    This interface represents an image painter. It gives the picture of each pixel using the coordinates.
    Author:
    Martin Cibils (261746), Jeremy Mion (261178)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javafx.scene.paint.Color colorAt(int x, int y)
      Gives the color of a specific point with his coordinates.
      static ImagePainter gray(ChannelPainter greyHue, ChannelPainter opacity)
      Gives a new ImagePainter made of gray with 2 different ChannelPainter.
      static ImagePainter hsb(ChannelPainter hue, ChannelPainter saturation, ChannelPainter brightness, ChannelPainter opacity)
      Gives a new ImagePainter with different colors made of 4 ChannelPainter.

    • Method Detail

      • colorAt

        javafx.scene.paint.Color colorAt(int x,
                                 int y)
        Gives the color of a specific point with his coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-axis coordinate.
        y - The y-axis coordinate.
        Returns:
        The color on that point.

      • hsb

        static ImagePainter hsb(ChannelPainter hue,
                        ChannelPainter saturation,
                        ChannelPainter brightness,
                        ChannelPainter opacity)
        Gives a new ImagePainter with different colors made of 4 ChannelPainter.
        Parameters:
        hue - The color of the image.
        saturation - The saturation of it.
        brightness - The brightness of it.
        opacity - The opacity of it.
        Returns:
        A new ImagePainter made of these ChannelPainter.

      • gray

        static ImagePainter gray(ChannelPainter greyHue,
                         ChannelPainter opacity)
        Gives a new ImagePainter made of gray with 2 different ChannelPainter.
        Parameters:
        greyHue - The color of the image.
        opacity - The opacity of it.
        Returns:
        A new ImagePainter.
